TopicTitle: IVA Internal outside of pod exterior

Articles.Content: Just as the title says, I'm having trouble with spawning my pod and having the interior spawn outside of the pod. Anyone else have this issue?
I believe you have to set the IVA to layer 16 in Unity. I don't remember what the layer is called but the important thing is layer 16.
IVA needs to be set 90deg off of the part structure. It makes absolutely zero sense to me. There's a .17 example that barely works anymore. I'll try to find it.
